idea-plugin.name: Noemi Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Noemi Theme

A beautiful and modern dark theme collection for JetBrains IDEs.

Features:

  • Two stunning dark theme variants: July and November
  • Carefully crafted color palettes for comfortable coding
  • Full support for all JetBrains IDEs
  • Optimized for long coding sessions
idea-plugin.change-notes:

  • Initial release
  • Noemi July theme: Deep dark theme with red accents
  • Noemi November theme: Balanced dark theme with vibrant colors
